## Success Criteria
<!-- What constitutes successful testing? -->
- [ ] All test cases pass
- [ ] Code coverage >= 80% (where applicable)
- [ ] Performance benchmarks met
- [ ] Security tests pass
- [ ] No critical/high severity bugs
- [ ] Documentation updated
